mapper.select: select a.created , a.last_ddl_time , b.* from (select created , last_ddl_time , object_name , owner from sys.all_objects where object_type = 'SEQUENCE' and object_name = #{sequence_name} and owner = #{sequence_owner})a,sys.all_sequences b where sequence_owner = a.owner and sequence_name = a.object_name
